Hi,

    Does anybody have any thoughts on the causes of
bloat...?

    e.g. the reason I ask is because, however much I
push the probability of delete above that of insert,
my genomes just keep growing...

    Not that I indent that as a final fix for it, but
I'm experimenting...

    Ian
